resources.string:
Documentation

A manual for the use of Secure SMS Proxy can be found here: Manual.

Disclaimer

The author assumes no responsibility, gives no guarantee when using the application.

The application is free. The source code is available as open source under the Apache 2.0 license.

S2SMP only works with the permissions to send and receive SMS. S2SMP provides SMS communication to other applications for previously authorised phone numbers. The SMS exchange between S2SMP and authorized applications is always encrypted. S2SMP uses no other permissions to ensure the security and integrity.
S2MSP was crashed unexpectedly. To improve the stability of Secure SMS Proxy, please send the crash report to the author via e-mail.
The stated application requests permissions to send and receive SMS via S2MSP restricted to the following phone numbers:
